mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_takeout (asset_id,user_id,purpose,takeback_time,operator,operator_time ,sn , takeout_time) VALUES (#{assetId},#{userId},#{purpose},#{takebackTime},#{operator},#{operatorTime} , #{sn},#{takeoutTime})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.select: select t.takeout_id takeoutId , t.asset_id assetId , t.user_id userId , t.purpose purpose , t.takeout_time takeoutTime, t.takeback_time takebackTime , t.operator operator , t.operator_time operatorTime , t.sn sn from t_takeout t where t.takeout_id = #{value}
